name: sindri
description: Sindri: A utility to configure runtime settings of a NodeJS project through the command line.
readme:
# Sindri

A utility to configure runtime settings of a NodeJS project through the command line. Please fork and configure to your own Mjölnir project.


## Resources

 * [Sindri on CNPR][cnpr]
 * [Sindri in Stash][stash]

[cnpr]: http://crt-dev-linux.devid.local:9009/module/sindri-cdau
[stash]: https://repo.advisory.com/projects/CNM/repos/sindri-cdau/


## Installation

Install sindri as a global Node module:

    $ cnpr install -g sindri-cdau

*Note: You may need to use 'sudo' if you do not have admin privleges.*

You also install it locally to an individual project and create a script that will access /node_modules/sindri-cdau/bin/sindri directly. This is the default practice in CDAU.


## Usage

Run the CLI to the configuration of a CDAU Mjölnir project and enter the appropriate information when prompted.

    $ sindri


## Dependencies

Sindri is written to be used on a CDAU Mjölnir project. Please feel free to fork the repo and make a version for your product.
